sql.query: select count(repay_id) as count from PRD_ONLINE_REPAYCAPACITY where repay_prdcode = '^'
select repay_id from PRD_ONLINE_REPAYCAPACITY where repay_prdcode = '^'
delete from PRD_ONLINE_REPAYCAPACITY where repay_prdcode = ?
select count(repay_prdcode) as repaycount from PRD_REPAYCAPACITY where REPAY_PRDCODE = '^'

select REPAY_ID,REPAY_INCRANGEFROM,REPAY_INCRANGETO,REPAY_SALARIEDSUSTANECE,REPAY_NONSALARIEDSUSTANECE,REPAY_ARTIFICIALSUSTANECE,REPAY_CREDIT from PRD_REPAYCAPACITY where REPAY_PRDCODE = '^' order by REPAY_ID

insert into PRD_ONLINE_REPAYCAPACITY (REPAY_PRDCODE,REPAY_ID,REPAY_INCRANGEFROM,REPAY_INCRANGETO,REPAY_SALARIEDSUSTANECE,REPAY_NONSALARIEDSUSTANECE,REPAY_ARTIFICIALSUSTANECE,REPAY_CREDIT) values (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
select prd_internet from products where prd_type='^' and upper(prd_renew) = 'N' and prd_internet='Y' and prd_code != '^'
insert into interest_master (int_prdcode, int_seqno, int_amtrangefrom, int_amtrangeto) values (?,?,?,?)
insert into interest_value (int_seqno, int_tenorsno, int_termfrom, int_termto, int_interest) values (?,?,?,?,?)
select nvl(max(int_seqno),0)+1 as maxid from interest_master where int_prdcode ='^'
delete from interest_master where int_prdcode = ?
delete from interest_value where int_seqno = ?
select int_seqno from interest_master where int_prdcode = '^'
select count(int_seqno) as count from interest_master where int_prdcode = '^'

insert into users (usr_id, usr_grpid, usr_orgcode, usr_fname, usr_mname, usr_lname, usr_password, usr_class, usr_supid, usr_supstatus, usr_avail, usr_function, usr_sanction_limit, usr_designation, usr_first_flag,usr_seq_id) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)

update users set usr_grpid=?, usr_orgcode=?, usr_fname=?, usr_mname=?, usr_lname=?, usr_class=?, usr_supid=?, usr_supstatus=?, usr_avail=?, usr_function=?, usr_sanction_limit=?, usr_designation=? where usr_id=?
update users set usr_password=?,usr_first_flag=? where usr_id=?
update users set usr_password=?,usr_first_flag=?,usr_pwd_reset_date=sysdate where usr_id=?

insert into organisations(org_code, org_level, org_scode, org_name, org_add1, org_add2, org_city, org_zip, org_state, org_phone, org_fax, org_taxid, org_trasitid, org_url, org_micr, org_head,org_active_flag,org_city_desc,org_state_desc,org_district,org_district_desc,org_excelupload_flag) values(?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'Y',?,?,?,?,?)
delete from STATE_DIST_CITY_MASTER where sdcm_type='S' and sdcm_id=?
insert into STATE_DIST_CITY_MASTER(SDCM_ID,SDCM_TYPE,SDCM_CODE,SDCM_DESCRIPTION ,SDCM_PARENT_ID, SDCM_DELETED) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)
update STATE_DIST_CITY_MASTER set SDCM_CODE=?, SDCM_DESCRIPTION=? where SDCM_ID=?
delete from STATE_DIST_CITY_MASTER where sdcm_type='C' and sdcm_id=?

update organisations set org_level=?, org_scode=?, org_name=?, org_add1=?, org_add2=?, org_city=?, org_zip=?, org_state=?, org_phone=?, org_fax=?, org_taxid=?, org_trasitid=?, org_url=?, org_micr=?, org_head=?,org_city_desc=?,org_state_desc=?,org_district=?,org_district_desc=?,org_excelupload_flag=? where org_code =?
delete from STATE_DIST_CITY_MASTER where sdcm_type='S' and sdcm_id=?
insert into STATE_DIST_CITY_MASTER(SDCM_ID,SDCM_TYPE,SDCM_CODE,SDCM_DESCRIPTION ,SDCM_PARENT_ID, SDCM_DELETED) values (?,?,?,?,?,?)
update STATE_DIST_CITY_MASTER set SDCM_CODE=?, SDCM_DESCRIPTION=? where SDCM_ID=?
delete from users

insert into users (USR_SEQ_ID,USR_ID,USR_GRPID,USR_ORGCODE,USR_FNAME,USR_MNAME ,USR_LNAME,USR_PASSWORD,USR_CLASS,USR_AVAIL,USR_FUNCTION,USR_DESIGNATION ,USR_FIRST_FLAG,USR_PWD_RESET_DATE,USR_SUPID,USR_SUPSTATUS,USR_SANCTION_LIMIT)
select USERS_USR_SEQ_ID_SEQ.nextval,USR_ID,USR_GRPID,USR_ORGCODE,USR_FNAME,USR_MNAME,USR_LNAME ,USR_PASSWORD,USR_CLASS,USR_AVAIL,USR_FUNCTION,USER_DESIGNATION,USER_FIRST_FLAG,USR_PWDRESET_DATE ,USR_SUPID,USR_SUPSTATUS,USR_SANCTION_LIMIT from users@ubi_online
delete from organisations

insert into organisations (ORG_CODE,ORG_LEVEL,ORG_SOLID,ORG_NAME,ORG_ADDR1,ORG_ADDR2 ,ORG_CITY,ORG_ZIP,ORG_STATE,ORG_PHONE,ORG_FAX,ORG_URL,ORG_HEAD,ORG_BRANCHIN,ORG_BRANCHTYPE ,ORG_CENTRENAME,ORG_INTERNET_CENTRE,ORG_ISSARAL,ORG_MICR,ORG_REGION,ORG_SAABRANCH,ORG_SARALHEAD ,ORG_SCODE,ORG_TAXID,ORG_TRASITID,ORG_VILLAGE)
select ORG_CODE,ORG_LEVEL,SOLID,ORG_NAME,ORG_ADD1,ORG_ADD2,ORG_CITY,ORG_ZIP,ORG_STATE ,ORG_PHONE,ORG_FAX,ORG_URL,ORG_HEAD,ORG_BRANCHIN,ORG_BRANCHTYPE,ORG_CENTRENAME ,ORG_INTERNET_CENTRE,ORG_ISSARAL,ORG_MICR,ORG_REGION,ORG_SAABRANCH,ORG_SARALHEAD ,ORG_SCODE,ORG_TAXID,ORG_TRASITID,ORG_VILLAGE from organisations@ubi_online
delete from STATE_DIST_CITY_MASTER where sdcm_type = 'C'
insert into STATE_DIST_CITY_MASTER(sdcm_id,sdcm_type,sdcm_code,sdcm_description,sdcm_parent_id,SDCM_DELETED) select '2'||CITY_ID,'C',CITY_CODE,CITY_NAME,1||STATE_ID,'N' from laps_cities@ubi_online
delete from STATE_DIST_CITY_MASTER where sdcm_type = 'S'
insert into STATE_DIST_CITY_MASTER(sdcm_id,sdcm_type,sdcm_code,sdcm_description ,sdcm_parent_id,SDCM_DELETED) select '1'||STATE_ID,'S',STATE_CODE,STATE_NAME,'0','N' from laps_states@ubi_online
select ^ from organisations, cust_preliminary where trim(prelim_city) = trim(org_code) and ^ and PRELIM_LOANTYPE = '^' and prelim_request_type = '^'

select ^ from organisations, cust_preliminary where trim(prelim_city) = trim(org_code) and ^ and PRELIM_LOANTYPE in (^) and nvl(PRELIM_IS_NEED_HELP, '') = 'Y' and prelim_upload_status != 'Y' and prelim_appln_status != 'D' and nvl(Prelim_is_lead_attended, ' ') != 'Y' and (TO_DATE(to_char(PRELIM_RECEIVED_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY')) order by PRELIM_LOANTYPE

select ^ from organisations, cust_preliminary where trim(prelim_city) = trim(org_code) and ^ and PRELIM_LOANTYPE in (^) and nvl(prelim_upload_status,' ') != 'Y' and nvl(prelim_appln_status, ' ') != 'D' and nvl(PRELIM_IS_NEED_HELP, ' ') != 'Y' and nvl(Prelim_is_lead_attended, ' ') != 'Y' and nvl(prelim_submit, ' ') = 'Y' and (TO_DATE(to_char(PRELIM_RECEIVED_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY')) order by PRELIM_LOANTYPE

select ^ from organisations, cust_preliminary where trim(prelim_city) = trim(org_code) and ^ and PRELIM_LOANTYPE in (^) and nvl(prelim_upload_status,' ') != 'Y' and nvl(prelim_appln_status, ' ') != 'D' and nvl(PRELIM_IS_NEED_HELP, ' ') != 'Y' and nvl(Prelim_is_lead_attended, ' ') != 'Y' and nvl(prelim_submit, ' ') != 'Y' and (TO_DATE(to_char(PRELIM_RECEIVED_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY'),'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY')) order by PRELIM_LOANTYPE
select NVL(max(usr_seq_id),0)+1 as usr_seqid from users

select ^ from com_prelimrequest,organisations where ^ and org_code=comapp_org_scode AND NVL(COMAPP_UPLOAD_STATUS,' ') != 'Y' AND NVL(COMAPP_APPLN_STATUS, ' ') != 'D' AND NVL(COMAPP_IS_NEED_HELP, ' ') != 'Y' AND NVL(COMAPP_ISLEADATTENDED, ' ') != 'Y' AND NVL(COMAPP_SUBMIT,'')!='Y' AND COMAPP_APPLN_STATUS IN ('S','N') and (TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY')) order by COMAPP_REFNO

select ^ from com_prelimrequest,organisations where ^ and org_code=comapp_org_scode AND NVL(COMAPP_UPLOAD_STATUS,' ') != 'Y' AND NVL(COMAPP_APPLN_STATUS, ' ') != 'D' AND NVL(COMAPP_IS_NEED_HELP, ' ') != 'Y' AND NVL(COMAPP_ISLEADATTENDED, ' ') != 'Y' and COMAPP_SUBMIT='Y' and COMAPP_APPLN_STATUS='Y' and (TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY')) order by COMAPP_REFNO

select ^ from com_prelimrequest,organisations where ^ and org_code=comapp_org_scode AND COMAPP_UPLOAD_STATUS= 'Y' and (TO_DATE(CREATE_DATE,'DD/MM/YYYY') between TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY') and TO_DATE('^','DD/MM/YYYY')) order by COMAPP_REFNO
